summary: Makes the  Fine Armguards craftable at the forge both clothes and armor (see pictures)
descriptionHtml:
New Version 3.0.0 

Adds a heavy version to the light version and the non-armor version it is
forged with a 1 leather and 1 steel and tempered with 1 steel
_____________________________________________________________________________
I always loved the fine armguards but to obtain them you had to kill a jarl or use the command list .
 Fear not now you are able to fully obtain them both for clothing  with 0 armor and for  light armor that is upgradable with 1 iron ingot the requiments are 5 leather strip for clothes version and 5 leather strip for armored version hope you liked and leave a comment :D.
 You can download it either with NMM (nexus mod manager) or by downloading manually unzip it and place it  at \\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data then when you open skyrim and go at data files and then you select  Fine Armguards  (if it is not already selected ) .
author: Garuger
